mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(user_count_tb_date,'dd') "user_count_tb_date", user_count_tb_visitors, user_count_tb_joiners, user_count_tb_outcount FROM user_count WHERE user_count_tb_date BETWEEN '${StartDate}' and '${EndDate}'

SELECT K.USER_COUNT_TB_DATE, SUM(USER_COUNT_TB_VISITORS) "userCountTbVisitors", SUM(USER_COUNT_TB_JOINERS) "userCountTbJoiners", SUM(USER_COUNT_TB_OUTCOUNT) "userCountTbOutcount" FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(USER_COUNT_TB_DATE,'MM') "USER_COUNT_TB_DATE", USER_COUNT_TB_VISITORS, USER_COUNT_TB_JOINERS, USER_COUNT_TB_OUTCOUNT FROM USER_COUNT ) K GROUP BY K.USER_COUNT_TB_DATE ORDER BY K.USER_COUNT_TB_DATE ASC
